channel.title: 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars - Victor Sector (Mondays in March)
channel.description:
***For the first 48 hours (*until 16th January at 1pm*) please only sign up to this game if you have already played in a previous game of 3:16 with me on The Gauntlet.***
*“Tired Of Life? Join The Expeditionary Force And See The Cosmos.”* — **Recruitment Advert**
![Vrakk-300x218|300x218](upload://xbnxgKRSq4X1KcNzjxKjf85Twk8.jpeg)
The elite 3:16th Expeditionary Force left Terra many years ago with an explicit mission: Alien civilizations, intelligences and life of any kind are to be wiped out to protect the future safety of the people home on Terra.
This is the 3:16th's final sector, and things are going to get bloody!
This session is scheduled for 3.5 hours, and will be recorded (though I'll check with everyone at the end of the session to make sure it's ok to make public).
This is for 4 sessions of 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars. Being able to attend each session is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This is a continuation of previous sectors played and if you played in those you are welcome to return to duty with your Trooper. But if you didn't, fresh meat is always welcome on the front lines!
**Content Warning:** Militarism, Genocide
We will be using Zoom as the platform. Participants must be able to access Roll20 tools for the game. The X-card will be used. The community's Code of Conduct will be in operation.
RSVPs open to all on 17th January at 1pm
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MR031wgv9_WK4y6L8op) [date=2021-03-01 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-03-01 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MR03ICWlzX23VZWzsCs) [date=2021-03-08 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-03-08 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MR03X1HIRRAlF5rMzPM) [date=2021-03-15 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-03-15 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MR07sUSF_cwD0L4P162) [date=2021-03-22 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2021-03-22 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]

item.title: 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars - Victor Sector (Mondays in March)
item.dc:creator: @Donogh
item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

For the first 48 hours (until 16th January at 1pm) please only sign up to this game if you have already played in a previous game of 3:16 with me on The Gauntlet.

“Tired Of Life? Join The Expeditionary Force And See The Cosmos.”
— Recruitment Advert

The elite 3:16th Expeditionary Force left Terra many years ago with an explicit mission: Alien civilizations, intelligences and life of any kind are to be wiped out to protect the future safety of the people home on Terra.

This is the 3:16th’s final sector, and things are going to get bloody!

This session is scheduled for 3.5 hours, and will be recorded (though I’ll check with everyone at the end of the session to make sure it’s ok to make public).

This is for 4 sessions of 3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars. Being able to attend each session is encouraged but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend. This is a continuation of previous sectors played and if you played in those you are welcome to return to duty with your Trooper. But if you didn’t, fresh meat is always welcome on the front lines!

Content Warning: Militarism, Genocide

We will be using Zoom as the platform. Participants must be able to access Roll20 tools for the game.
The X-card will be used. The community’s Code of Conduct will be in operation.

RSVPs open to all on 17th January at 1pm
